page.title: 16The Registrar
page.content: The registrar was born in Gretna.She became registrar in 1955 when the population was about half of that today.There have been a lot of runaway marriages with the boom time being during the 1960's.The runaways have come from all over{Europe},and as faraway as{America }and{Russia.}One of the strangest requests came from a gentleman who wished to marry his plant.This gentleman was redirected to the{Blacksmiths Shop}at{Springfield,} the original marriage centre,where he married his intended in a mock ceremony over the anvil. In a week{Pat}performs about 35 marriages.Indeed in the first half of 1985 500 weddings had taken place.
